item.title: Lena add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "Let us toast to animal pleasures, to escapism, to rain on the roof and instant coffee, to unemployment insurance and library cards, to absinthe and good-hearted landlords, to music and warm bodies and contraceptives... and to the "good life", whatever it is and wherever it happens to be." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Lena add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "Weird behavior is natural in smart children, like curiosity is to a kitten." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Lena add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description:
"We are going to punish somebody for this attack, but just who or where will be blown to smithereens for it is hard to say. Maybe Afghanistan, maybe Pakistan or Iraq, or possibly all three at once. Who knows? Not even the Generals in what remains of the Pentagon or the New York papers calling for war seem to know who did it or where to look for them.
This is going to be a very expensive war, and Victory is not guaranteed--for anyone, and certainly not for a baffled little creep like George W. Bush. All he knows is that his father started the war a long time ago, and that he, the goofy child President, has been chosen by Fate and the global Oil industry to finish it off." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Lena add a quote by Aleister Crowley
item.description: "I was not content to believe in a personal devil and serve him, in the ordinary sense of the word. I wanted to get hold of him personally and become his chief of staff." -- Aleister Crowley

item.title: Lena add a quote by Aleister Crowley
item.description: "The Way of Mastery is to break all the rules&mdash;but you have to know them perfectly before you can do this; otherwise you are not in a position to transcend them." -- Aleister Crowley

item.title: Lena add a quote by Christopher Poindexter
item.description:
"I admit, I was afraid to love. Not just love, but to love her. For she was a stunning mystery. She carried things deep inside her that no one has yet to understand, and I, I was afraid to fail, like the others.
She was the ocean and i was just a boy who loved the waves but was completely terrified to swim." -- Christopher Poindexter

item.title: Lena add a quote by Christopher Poindexter
item.description: "I loved her not for the way she danced with my angels, but for the way the sound of her name could silence my demons." -- Christopher Poindexter

item.title: Lena add a quote by Christopher Poindexter
item.description:
"I read her eyes like paragraphs and her tears like chapters for she didn't have much to say with words, but rather, silence.
And never let them tell you that silence, isn't beautiful. For silence is what happens when words fall asleep and you must carry the belief that one day they will wake up inside of you." -- Christopher Poindexter

item.title: Lena add a quote by Christopher Poindexter
item.description: "Her eyes carried a certain kind of silence that begged to be understood and i felt as if i was a scientist, staring with eager, feverant eyes into galaxies that have not yet had the chance to be named." -- Christopher Poindexter

item.title: Lena add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "And those who were seen dancing were thought to be insane by those who could not hear the music." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Lena add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "Imperfection is beauty, madness is genius and it's better to be absolutely ridiculous than absolutely boring." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Lena add a quote by Deepak Chopra
item.description: "Sex is always about emotions. Good sex is about free emotions; bad sex is about blocked emotions." -- Deepak Chopra

item.title: Lena add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "Dance, when you're broken open. Dance, if you've torn the bandage off. Dance in the middle of the fighting. Dance in your blood. Dance when you're perfectly free." -- Rumi

item.title: Lena add a quote by Howard Phillips Lovecraft
item.description: "Almost nobody dances sober, unless they happen to be insane." -- Howard Phillips Lovecraft

item.title: Lena add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description:
"Sleep my little baby-oh Sleep until you waken When you wake you'll see the world If I'm not mistaken...
Kiss a lover Dance a measure, Find your name And buried treasure...
Face your life Its pain, Its pleasure, Leave no path untaken." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Lena add a quote by Oprah Winfrey
item.description: "Every day brings a chance for you to draw in a breath, kick off your shoes, and dance." -- Oprah Winfrey

item.title: Lena add a quote by Craig Ferguson
item.description: "If a man doesn't know how to dance he doesn't know how to make love, there I said it!" -- Craig Ferguson

item.title: Lena add a quote by Amelia Atwater-Rhodes
item.description: "In a society that worships love, freedom and beauty, dance is sacred,It is a paryer for the future, a remembrance of the past and a joyful exclamation of thanks for the present." -- Amelia Atwater-Rhodes

item.title: Lena add a quote by Michelle Hodkin
item.description: "Thinking something does not make it true. Wanting something does not make it real." -- Michelle Hodkin

item.title: Lena add a quote by Henry James
item.description: "It's time to start living the life you've imagined." -- Henry James

item.title: Lena add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference. The opposite of art is not ugliness, it's indifference. The opposite of faith is not heresy, it's indifference. And the opposite of life is not death, it's indifference." -- Elie Wiesel

item.title: Lena add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Lena add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "I love you without knowing how, or when, or from where. I love you simply, without problems or pride: I love you in this way because I do not know any other way of loving but this, in which there is no I or you, so intimate that your hand upon my chest is my hand, so intimate that when I fall asleep your eyes close." -- Pablo Neruda

item.title: Lena add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "I love deadlines. I love the whooshing noise they make as they go by." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Lena add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Lena add a quote by George Eliot
item.description: "It is never too late to be what you might have been." -- George Eliot

item.title: Lena add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "If you can't explain it to a six year old, you don't understand it yourself." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Lena add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "I'm not upset that you lied to me, I'm upset that from now on I can't believe you." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Lena add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Logic will get you from A to Z; imagination will get you everywhere." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Lena add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "There is no greater agony than bearing an untold story inside you." -- Maya Angelou
